cards.flavor: Once proud monuments, the ruins of ancient ziggurats now serve as humble stops for wandering Knights of the Reliquary.
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine (Alara)
cards.originalText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
